Description: Near Mint - JP100. Killer guitar in almost new condition. Has one small blemish on the front between the bridge and the strap peg (see last photo). Comes with padded factory gigbag. Still has the plastic on the rear cavity covers.The JP100 John Petrucci Signature is based on the "Ball Family Reserve" JP6 with a slightly larger basswood body has a scooped forearm contour and is capped with a figured, quilted maple top. The maple neck with rosewood fretboard and 24 medium-jumbo frets has a slightly asymmetrical back carve with a flatter bass side to naturally fit the curve of your hand. Other shred-friendly features include a Sterling Modern Trem bridge, locking tuners, and two Sterling HI-output humbuckers with an diagonally angled 3-way pickup switch for easier access. Highly respected in the metal/prog community, John Petrucci of Dream Theater is known worldwide for his incendiary chops, creative songwriting and incredible tone. His devotion to his craft inspires legions of players across the globe. Comes with factory padded gig bag. FeaturesBasswood body with quilted maple topMatching headstock with John's signatureMaple neck with slightly asymetrical back carveRosewood fingerboardJP shield Inlays24 medium-jumbo fretsDual Sterling Hi-output humbuckersMaster volume and tone controlsPetrucci dome-style knobs3-way angled metal pickup switchSterling Modern non-locking tremolo bridge with adjusable-tension vibrato barLocking tuners
Title: Sterling by Music Man JP100 John Petrucci Signature
